tool.name: Call SNPS with Freebayes
tool.command:
ln -s $reference localref.fa && ln -s $bamfile localbam.bam && samtools faidx localref.fa 2>&1 || echo "Error running samtools faidx for FreeBayes" >&2 && samtools sort localbam.bam localbam.bam 2>&1 || echo "Error running samtools sort for FreeBayes" >&2 && samtools index localbam.bam 2>&1 || echo "Error running samtools index for FreeBayes" >&2 && freebayes --fasta-reference localref.fa localbam.bam --vcf $output #if $params.source_select == "full": $params.showRefRepeats -T $params.theta -p $params.ploidy $params.pooled $params.mnps $params.nosnps -n $params.bestAlleles $params.allAlleles $params.duplicateReads -M $params.refMapQuality $params.ignoreRefAllele $params.haploidReference -m $params.minMapQuality -q $params.minBaseQuality $params.noFilters -x $params.indelExclusionWindow
-V $params.diffusionPriorScalar -W $params.postIntegBandwidth -Y $params.postIntegBanddepth -F $params.minAltFraction -C $params.minAltCount -G $params.minAltTotal --min-coverage $params.minCoverage #end if

param.name: source_select
param.label: Freebayes Settings to Use
param.help: For straight forward mapping needs use Commonly Used settings. If you want full control use Full Parameter List

param.name: indels
param.label: Include insertion and deletion alleles in the analysis

param.name: theta
param.label: Theta
param.help: The expected mutation rate or pairwise nucleotide diversity among the population under analysis. This serves as the single parameter to the Ewens Sampling Formula prior model

param.name: showRefRepeats
param.label: Show Reference Repeats
param.help: Calculate and show information about reference repeats in the VCF output

param.name: ploidy
param.label: Ploidy
param.help: Sets the default ploidy for the analysis

param.name: pooled
param.label: Pooled
param.help: Assume that samples result from pooled sequencing. When using this flag, set --ploidy to the number of alleles in each sample

param.name: mnps
param.label: Include multi-nuceotide polymorphisms in the analysis

param.name: duplicateReads
param.label: Include duplicate-marked alignments in the analysis

param.name: bestAlleles
param.label: Use Best N Alleles
param.help: Evaluate only the best N alleles, ranked by sum of supporting quality scores

param.name: refMapQuality
param.label: Assign mapping quality of Q to the reference allele at each site

param.name: refBaseQuality
param.label: Reference Base Quality
param.help: Assign a base quality of Q to the reference allele at each site

param.name: minMapQuality
param.label: Minimum Mapping Quality
param.help: Exclude alignments from analysis if they have a mapping quality less than Q

param.name: minBaseQuality
param.label: Minimum Base Quality
param.help: Exclude alleles from analysis if their supporting base quality is less than Q

param.name: indelExclusionWindow
param.label: Indel Exclusion Window
param.help: Ignore portions of alignments N bases from a putative insertion or deletion allele

param.name: ignoreRefAllele
param.label: Ignore Reference Allele
param.help: By default, the reference allele is considered as another sample. This flag excludes it from the analysis

param.name: haploidReference
param.label: Haploid Reference
param.help: If using the reference sequence as a sample, consider it to be haploid

param.name: noFilters
param.label: No Filters
param.help: Do not use any input base and mapping quality filters. Equivalent to -m 0 -q 0 -R 0 -S 0

param.name: diffusionPriorScalar
param.label: Diffusion Prior Scalar
param.help: Downgrade the significance of P(genotype combo | allele frequency) by taking the Nth root of this component of the prior

param.name: postIntegBandwidth
param.label: Posterior Integratoin Bandwidth
param.help: Integrate all genotype combinations in our posterior space which lie no more than N steps from the most likely combination in terms of data likelihoods, taking the N steps from the most to least likely genotype for each individual

param.name: postIntegBanddepth
param.label: Posterior Integratoin Banddepth
param.help: Generate all genotype combinations for which up to this number of samples have up to their -W'th worst genotype according to data likelihood

param.name: minAltFraction
param.label: Minimum Alternative Fraction
param.help: Require at least this fraction of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in the in order to evaluate the position

param.name: minAltCount
param.label: Minimum Alternative Count
param.help: Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position

param.name: minAltTotal
param.label: Minimum Alternative Total
param.help: Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within the total population in order to use the allele in analysis

param.name: minCoverage
param.label: Minimum Coverage
param.help: Require at least this coverage to process a site

tool.help: This tool uses Freebayes to call SNPS given a reference sequence and a BAM alignment file.
